invocations.description: Will broadcast a message with content msg at your current navigation channel. You must be in a navi channel to use this function. To read a received message you must setup a navmessages function.
invocations.ex:
init start
	function navmessages(msg)
		print(msg) -- will print information about the message you just received
	end
init end

navsay('healme')
invocations.exDescription: Will send everyone a message containing the message 'healme', possibly asking someone to heal you.  And it will print every message you receive on your current navigation channel.
